tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Budget (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    month VARCHAR(255),
    year INTEGER,
    total_income DECIMAL,
    total_expenses DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    income_id INTEGER REFERENCES Income(id),
    expense_id INTEGER REFERENCES Expenses(id),
    amount DECIMAL,
    date DATE
);
